taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family rosaceae;tribe rubeae;genus rubus;subgenus eubatus;section hispidi;species ambigens;

treatment.description: Resembling no. 61; expanding foliage white-pilose beneath; primocanes glandless; their subcoriaceous and fulvous leaves 5-foliolate, pilose on both surfaces, the larger leaflets 6-7.5 cm. long.
treatment.habitat_elevation_distribution_or_ecolog: Wet peaty savannas, pinelands and clearings, se. Va. Fl. late May, early June.
